Rotation Property¶

class RotationMatrixProperty.RotationMatrixProperty(points, rotation_matrix, rotation_axis=None)[source]¶

Warning

Now only implemented for Euler angles.

Attributes

Points Holds the points dataset
Raster Holds raster dataset
RotationMatrix Points’ rotation matrix with respect to reference pointset
Size Return the size of the property
rotationMatrix Points’ rotation matrix with respect to reference pointset
transformationMatrix
translationMatrix Points’ translation matrix with respect to reference pointset

Methods

EulerAngles_from_R([dtype]) Extracts rotation angles from the rotation matrix
FromFile()
eulerAngles_from_R([dtype]) Extracts euler rotation angles from the rotation matrix
getValues() Get a specific characteristic value of the property
save(filename, **kwargs) Save the property in either json or hdf5.
setValues(*args, **kwargs) Sets the rotation matrix for the RotationMatrixProperty object
EulerAngles_from_R(dtype='degrees')[source]¶

Extracts rotation angles from the rotation matrix

Warning

The angles returned are subjected to ambiguity

Parameters: dtype (str) – the output in ‘degrees’ or ‘radians’ (default ‘degrees’)
Returns: (omega, phi, kappa) according to the dtype
Return type: tuple
RotationMatrix¶

Points’ rotation matrix with respect to reference pointset

setValues(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Sets the rotation matrix for the RotationMatrixProperty object

Parameters:
  • rotationMatrix – a 3x3 matrix that holds the rotation
  • rotationAxis – a 3x1 vector that holds the axis about which the rotation is made, in a quaternion case

Optionals

Parameters: rotation_type – ‘quaternions’, ‘euler’
